page.title: 14BLUEBELL HILL MYSTERY
page.content: Bluebell Hill today is a dual carriageway,but the tale we wish to tell is of an accident on the orginal Bluebell Hill.In 1965 a young lady, who was about to be married was travelling in a Mini Car with three other girls towards Chatham.The car spun off the road,killing three,one of whom was the bride-to-be.Since the crash,motorists have reported sightings of a young woman.Often on a winter night,a girl clad in summer dress is seen hitching a lift.She later disappears in mysterious circumstances.Police have been involved on several occasions.At one time ,a man thought that he had hit a girl on this road.He wrapped her in a rug by the side of the road and contacted Rochester Police.They arrived to find only the crumpled rug.Itensive searches revealed nothing
